S06n577:1: tatra khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ bhāṣiṣyate-yena satyena satyavacanena ahaṃ vyākṛtaḥ taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06n577:3: tatra subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānautsukyamāpatsyate tasya amanuṣyasyāpakramaṇāya |
S06n577:5: māro hyatra pāpīyāṃstasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cirayānasaṃprasthitasyāntike balavattaraṃ tejovattaraṃ codyogamāpatsyate-kathamayamamanuṣyo'pakrāmediti |
S06n577:7: evaṃ ca tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhaviṣyati-mamaiṣo'nubhāvena amanuṣyo'pakrānta iti |
S06n577:8: na punaḥ sa evaṃ jñāsyati-mārasyaiṣo'nubhāvena amanuṣyo'pakrānta iti |
S06n577:10: sa tenautsukyena tato'nyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamaṃsyate uccagdhayiṣyati ullāpayiṣyati kutsayiṣyati paṃsayiṣyati-ahaṃ vyākṛtastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti |
S06n577:11: sa tena tāvanmātrakeṇa bhūyo mānaṃ janayiṣyati,
S06n577:20: sa tena mānena atimānena mānātimānena mithyāmānena abhimānena dūrīkariṣyati sarvajñatām,
S06n577:25: sa tathārūpāṇi kalyāṇamitrāṇi kalyāṇadharmaṇa udārādhimuktikānadhyāśayasaṃpannānupāyakuśalānavinivartanīyadharmasamanvāgatāṃśca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān dṛṣṭvā abhimānamutpādya avamanyamānastathārūpāṇi kalyāṇamitrāṇi na seviṣyate,
S06n577:31: evaṃ subhūte satyādhiṣṭhānena māraḥ pāpīyānacirayānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya alpaśraddhasya alpaśrutasya kalyāṇamitravirahitasya prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītasya upāyakauśalyavirahitasya antarāyaṃ kariṣyatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
S06n577:32: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārakarma veditavyam ||
S06n577:33: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpadeśenāpi mārakarma bhaviṣyati |
S06n577:34: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpedeśenāpi mārakarma bhaviṣyati?
S06n577:35: iha subhūte bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ nāmāpadeśenāpi nāmādhiṣṭhānenāpi māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkramiṣyati |
S06n577:36: anyatarānyatareṇa veṣeṇopasaṃkramya evaṃ vakṣyati-tairvyākṛtastvaṃ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S06n577:44: yāvadāsaptamaṃ mātāmahapitāmahayugasya nāmadheyamudīrayiṣyati-amuṣyāṃ diśi tvaṃ jātaḥ,
S06n577:45: amuṣmin janapade amuṣmin grāme vā nagare vā nigame vā jāta iti |
S06n577:65: tamenaṃ māraḥ pāpīyāṃstena tena dṛṣṭadhārmikeṇa guṇenādekṣyati-pūrvamapi tvamanena cānena ca guṇena samanvāgato'bhūḥ |
S06n577:66: niyatastaṃ vyākṛtastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avinivartanīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau |
S06n577:68: tathā hi te amī evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇāḥ saṃvidyante |
S06n577:70: evaṃ sa tena paurvakeṇa nāmāpadeśena nāmādhiṣṭhānena pratyutpannadhutaguṇasaṃlekhena ca manyanāmutpādayiṣyati |
S06n577:71: tasyaivaṃ bhaviṣyati-vyākṛto'haṃ taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06n577:73: taṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānevaṃ vakṣyati-avinivartanīyastvaṃ vyākṛtastathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S06n577:75: tathā hi tava ete evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇā saṃvidyante |
S06n577:76: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte māraḥ pāyīyān kadācidbhikṣuveṣeṇopasaṃkramiṣyati,
S06n577:87: upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati-vyākṛtastvaṃ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avinivartanīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau |
S06n577:89: tathā hi te evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇāḥ saṃvidyante,
S06n577:91: ye khalu punaḥ subhūte mayā avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ guṇā ākhyātāḥ ākārā liṅgāni nimittāni cākhyātāni,
S06n577:95: ye ākārā yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāni avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
S06n577:97: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nena nāmādhiṣṭhānena abhimānamutpādayiṣyati |
S06n577:98: abhimānamutpādya mānābhibhūtaḥ stambhābhibhūto mārādhiṣṭhānenābhibhūtastadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamaṃsyate uccagghayiṣyati ullāpayiṣyati kutsayiṣyati paṃsayiṣyati |
S06n577:99: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmādhiṣṭhānena mārakarma veditavyam ||
S06n577:100: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmāpadeśena nāmavyākaraṇena mārakarma veditavyam |
S06n577:101: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmāpadeśena nāmavyākaraṇena mārakarma veditavyam?
S06n577:102: iha subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamevaṃ vyākariṣyati-tavānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti yadeva tena cittenānuvartitamanuvitarkitamanuvicāritaṃ bhavati-aho bata me'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ idamevaṃrūpaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bhavediti,
S06n577:104: tatra duṣprajñajātīyasya anupāyakuśalasya bodhisattvasyaivaṃ bhaviṣyati-yathā mayā nāmadheyamanuvartitamanuvitarkitamanuvicāritam,
S06n577:105: aho bata me'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bhavediti,
S06n577:108: yacca tena māreṇa pāpīyasā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhirabhinirmitena mārādhiṣṭhitena vā bhikṣuṇā nāmadheyamudīritam,
S06n577:109: tadubhayaṃ tulayitvā yathā ca mama cittotpāda utpannaḥ,
S06n577:110: yathā ca anena bhikṣuṇā nirdiṣṭaṃ mama nāmadheyaṃ sameti nāmnā,
S06n577:111: nāmavyākṛto'haṃ taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti maṃsyate |
S06n577:112: yāni ca mayā subhūte avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmākārā liṅgāni nimittāni ākhyātāni,
S06n577:115: sa manyanāmutpādya tato'nyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamaṃsyate-ahaṃ vyākṛto'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06n577:117: evaṃ sa tena mānena atimānena mānātimānena abhimānena mithyāmānena ca tadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamanyamāno dūrīkariṣyati sarvajñatām,
S06n577:119: tasya prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītasya upāyakauśalyavirahitasya kalyāṇamitravirahitasya pāpamitraparigṛhītasya dvayorbhūmyoranyatarā bhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā-śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā |
S06n577:120: sacetpunaściraṃ suciraṃ saṃdhāvya saṃsṛtya enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmo bhavet,
S06n577:130: tāvadgurutaraṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mananāpattisthānam |
S06n577:131: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte bhikṣoḥ śrāvakayānikasya śrāvakabhūmau catasro mūlāpattayo gurvyo bhavanti,
S06n577:135: yaduta nāmāpadeśena bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvamānanayā mahānakuśalaścittotpāda utpannaḥ |
S06n577:138: pañcabhyo'pi subhūte ānantaryebhyaḥ karmabhyo gurutaro'yaṃ cittotpādaḥ,
S06n577:139: yo'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpadeśena mānasahagataścittotpāda utpannaḥ |
S06n577:140: ayaṃ tebhyaḥ pañcabhya ānantaryebhyaḥ karmabhyo gurutaraścittotpādo veditavyaḥ |
S06n577:141: iti hi subhūte anenāpi nāmāpadeśena sūkṣmasūkṣmāṇi mārakarmāṇyutpatsyante |
S06n577:145: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān vivekaguṇena bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramya codayiṣyati smārayiṣyati |
S06n577:146: kathaṃ ca subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān vivekaguṇena bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramya codayiṣyati smārayiṣyati?
S06n577:147: iha subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramiṣyati,
S06n577:149: na cāhaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃvidhaṃ vivekaṃ vadāmi,
S06n577:150: yaduta āraṇyakāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni vijanapadāni viviktāni,
S06n577:152: subhūtirāha-katamaḥ punaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyo viveko yadi vā āraṇyakāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni vijanapadāni viviktāni vividhāni vanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānapalālapuñjādīni?
S06n577:155: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivikto bhavati śrāvakapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ,
S06n577:157: evaṃ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivikto viharati |
S06n577:158: grāmānte'pi hi viharan prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītaḥ sarvasattvamaitrīmahākaruṇāvihāreṇa viharet |
S06n577:159: anena vihāreṇa viharan vivikta eva sa viharati |
S06n577:160: ayaṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte mayā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktamanasikāraviveko'nujñātaḥ |
S06n577:161: anena vivekena viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rātriṃdivānyatināmayati,
S06n577:165: yaṃ punaḥ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān vivekamupadekṣyati araṇyavanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānaprāntaśayanāsanavihārān,
S06n577:166: sa tena vivekena śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ saṃkīrṇa eva san prajñāpāramitāyāmanabhiyujyamāno na sarvajñajñānaṃ paripūrayati |
S06n577:167: evaṃ sa saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa viharan so'pariśuddhena manasikāreṇa viharan apariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntaḥ eva bhaviṣyati |
S06n577:168: apariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmānta eva saṃstato'nyānapi bodhisattvān mahāsattvān grāmāntavihāriṇo'saṃkīrṇān śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ prajñopāyamahākaruṇāvihāravihāriṇo'vamaṃsyate |
S06n577:169: araṇye'pi viharan so'pariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntaḥ san saṃkīrṇavihāryeva bhavati,
S06n577:171: sa prajñopāyamahākaruṇāvihāravihāriṇo grāmānte viharataḥ pariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmasamudācārān śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktamanasikāraviviktānasaṃkīrṇān śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraistāṃstāvatso'vamanyamāno na dhyānasamādhisamāpattivimokṣābhijñānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati |
S06n577:175: kiṃcāpi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yojanaśatikeṣvaṭavīkāntāreṣu viharedapagatavyālamṛgapakṣisaṃgheṣu apagatakṣudramṛgavyālayakṣarākṣasānuvicariteṣu apagatacaurakāntārabhayabhairavopadraveṣu saṃtiṣṭhet,
S06n577:176: varṣaṃ vā varṣaśataṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ vā varṣaśatasahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīṃ vā varṣakoṭīśataṃ vā varṣakoṭīsahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā,
S06n577:178: imaṃ ca vivekaṃ mayopadiṣṭaṃ na jānīyāt,
S06n577:182: naiva me subhūte etāvatā sa bodhisattvaścittamārādhayati |
S06n577:184: yaḥ subhūte viveko bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mayā ākhyātaḥ,
S06n577:185: tena vivekena viharannasmin viveke na saṃdṛśyate |
S06n577:186: tamenaṃ māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkramya uparyantarīkṣe vihāyasi sthitvā evaṃ vakṣyati-sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S06n577:187: eṣa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathāgatena viveka ākhyātaḥ |
S06n577:190: sa tato vivekātpunareva araṇyādgrāmāntamavatīrya tadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān peśalān bhikṣūn sabrahmacāriṇaḥ kalyāṇadharmaṇo'saṃkīrṇān śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ pariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntān jīvānavamaṃsyate |
S06n577:191: sa evaṃ vakṣyati-saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa bateme āyuṣmanto viharanti,
S06n577:195: ye te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā viviktavihāreṇa viharanti,
S06n577:206: eṣa subhūte vihāro yenāhaṃ vihāreṇa viharāmi |
S06n577:218: tajjātīyaḥ khaluḥ punaḥ subhūte pudgalo na sevitavyo na bhaktavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ |
S06n577:220: abhimānapatitā hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ |
S06n577:222: aviśuddhadharmāṇo hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalāḥ veditavyāḥ |
S06n577:223: anāryā hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ |
S06n577:224: anāryadharmāṇo hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ |
S06n577:225: yasya khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya aparityaktāḥ sarvasattvāḥ,
S06n577:228: tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena sarvasattvānāmarthaṃ kartukāmena tajjātīyāḥ pudgalā na sevitavyāḥ,
S06n577:231: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sarvasattvānāmarthāya abhyutthitena eteṣāṃ ca anyeṣāṃ ca mārakarmaṇāmavabodhāya nityamevodvignacittena bhavitavyaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ mārgamapratilabhamānānāmupadeṣṭumutrastamānasena asaṃsṛṣṭena traidhātukena |
S06n577:232: tatrāpi tāvanmaitrāyamāṇena karuṇāyamānena mahākaruṇāmutpādya anukampāmupādāya samyakpratipanneṣu sattveṣu muditacittenānupalabdhidharmatayā dharmāṇāmupekṣakeṇa evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam-tathā kariṣyāmi yathā sarve mārakarmadoṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvatra sarvadā ca na bhaviṣyanti,
S06n577:237: ayamapi bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ svayamabhijñāya parākramo veditavyaḥ |
S06n577:238: idamapi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vivekaguṇena mārakarma veditavyamiti ||
